name: New Adventures
description:
I made this choose your own ending game as a joke for my wife. She plays Covet Fashion and hated the style department challenges. She also has to watch a lot of videos to get diamonds and most of the videos were about Choices, or Episodes which she also complained about, anyway...

Help Hannah negotiated Life, Love, Friendship and Work in New York, in this pick your own ending style department story.

It's about 100 Mb , and is definitely a work in progress. If you like it or hate it or could careless, please put a comment below.

I have added an Android build, but it doesn't work on all phones. If it does work on your phone let me know what type you have. Thanks.

Thanks, enjoy.
